title: Inspire Me!
body: I want you to post 2-3 three things, completely random, and I will try to make A champion out of it. Go wild! (I may not get every single one)

replies.body: looking over my old posts, and then i saw this again, and decided to look at it. I feel kinda bad for you, this is such a cool thing and very few people participated.
saw your comment, yah, I don't have as much time as I used too but when I do I think I will do this again.
this is kind of bad practice. Dont do this.
http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-1bAbx8ZMPbc/UplxQzP78GI/AAAAAAAABCc/SkMrMKhdtKs/s1600/tumblr_m498ejQboc1r1p9efo1_500.gif

No seriously, if you want to make champions like this thats fine, but please just post them in this thread. Making new threads for jokey champion ideas just because you think it's fun is a bad way to spam up the entire board. don't spam the board. Or if you do so, please post an explanation that it is because of this thread.
Actually the champions are supposed to be legit

1) a Shi-zhu puppy
2) a Coat hanger
3) my left shoe
[Taar'Muk](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/skin-champion-concepts/W2X4fWWV-taarmuk-in-progress?comment=0001) is complete! So?

Where is my left shoe? 

On the whole, good job. Tuning would be an interesting problem, but these are just concepts, so, we'll let riot figure that out if they take anything from here.(Personally I would make his W an active lasting 6-8 seconds) 

I am very much amused by the lore you came up with. I'm assuming he is friends with Twitch? Or does he have friends?

1. Left Shoe is where he grew from in the lore
2. He does have friends, Mostly in Kog'Maw. didn't think on Twitch as a friend but he could be 
3. Thank you for your over all Comment and I'm Happy to see that you like him in general
Challange Accepted
{{champion:74}} because I accidentally made a second response of the response above

1: The difference between stupidity and bravery
2: Spear and Shield
3: Invading russia in the winter
[Doltish](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/skin-champion-concepts/EP57rzx3-doltish-the-glory-seeker) is complete, do you like

That was the most beautiful thing I have ever seen.

You sir, deserve **ALL** the cookies.

Thank you
http://38.media.tumblr.com/tumblr_lv7dib65jg1r15uxlo1_500.gif

1: Wario
2: The concept of revenge
3: A Green Lantern Ring

Got any other ideas for me, maybe a friend with an idea, I'm open for ideas
